survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the level of engagement and satisfaction among residents of a shared apartment community, focusing on communal facilities, events, and overall living experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of communal areas (e.g., lobby, gym, rooftop)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for easy selection.
